Major credit cards, Bitcoin, and PayPal are accepted as methods of payment. Free setup/migration is available to any interested clients. 

ServeYourSite offers web hosting services that promise performance, value and quality. The web hosting service provider now brings fully managed virtual private servers that are reliable with the 100% uptime guarantee. Different VPS hosting plans are available and designed for the diverse range of businesses that want to host their websites and applications on the web.
